headline: Georgians now feeling some relief at the pump after gas tax suspension
sentences: On Fridays edition of Closer Look,? Frank Macchiarola, American Petroleum Institutes senior vice president of Policy, Economics, and Regulatory Affairs, discusses the current state of gas prices.
Recently, President Joe Biden expressed that skyrocketing gas prices are due to the current war in Ukraine and announced the release of oil from certain reserves to drive down gasoline costs.

Apr 9, 2022
Apr 8, 2022
Trending
Top Stories
WABEs Week In Review: Regulations on transgender high school athletes end Georgias legislative session as campaigns for 2022 ramp up
Georgians are feeling a little bit of relief after Governor Brian Kemp signed a law suspending Georgias motor fuel tax through the end of May.
According to AAA, Georgias average cost for a gallon of gas is $3.81.
